title: Tight money policy drives i rate up, Ig down

content.prompt: In the short run, a tight monetary policy tends to cause

choices.label: a decrease in the interest rate and a decrease in prices
a decrease in the interest rate and an increase in private investment
a decrease in prices and an increase in private investment
an increase in the interest rate and an increase in private investment
an increase in interest rate and a decrease in private investment

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
